name: Sneyser
description: The scintillating pool located on the Sneyser's hindquarters casts an enchanting glow on the walls of its crater, but it's best to appreciate this spectacle at a distance. One sneeze from a Sneyser with hay fever, and that serene puddle will burst into an explosive geyser!
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 16 hr, Enhanced Time: 1 day 6 hr
